uk.co.crider.jablus.agent

Class Agent

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.crider.jablus.data.CompoundData
      • uk.co.crider.jablus.agent.Agent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, Data, DataSet
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BDIAgent, DairyAgent, HumanAgent, RandomAgent

    public abstract class Agent
extends CompoundData
    Represents a decision making agent. All agents in the model should be a subclass of this. The agent object acts as a mediator between the environment and agent implementations. All signals from an agent to the environment are generated by calling methods from this class. All signals from the environment to agents are recieved via methods of this class.
